background: In modern cloud architectures, serverless computing allows developers to build applications without managing servers. AWS Lambda, in conjunction with API Gateway, serves as a potent combination for creating such backend infrastructures. This task revolves around creating such an architecture with specific AWS services, ensuring high security and availability while maximizing deployment flexibility.
aws_services: Lambda, API Gateway, S3 Bucket, SSM Parameter Store, IAM Role, CloudWatch LogGroup, CloudWatch Metric Alarm
author: tr-brian-karicha
